name: John JOSEPH v. Louis A. SAGE, M. D. et al.

parties: John JOSEPH v. Louis A. SAGE, M. D. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.

attorneys: Decof & Grimm, E. Paul Grimm, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Hanson, Curran & Parks, Dennis J. McCarten, Providence, Rice, Dolan, Kiernan & Kershaw, James A. Currier, Providence, for defendants-petitioners.
casebody.head_matter:
John JOSEPH v. Louis A. SAGE, M. D. et al.
No. 82-101-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 1, 1982.
Decof & Grimm, E. Paul Grimm, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Hanson, Curran & Parks, Dennis J. McCarten, Providence, Rice, Dolan, Kiernan & Kershaw, James A. Currier, Providence, for defendants-petitioners.
